sentences: Royce Jones (born December 15, 1954) is an American musician best known for his work as a touring vocalist with the bands Steely Dan (in 1973 and 1974) and Ambrosia (joined 1978).
In the summer of 2007, Jones joined a coverband called Screamin Lehman Band.
Royce Jones is now in The Royce Jones band, also formally a member of eight piece horn band called "Stonebridge".
In 2011 - 2012 he worked with the Tim Weisberg Band, Chuck Alvarez and Paul Turner.
